head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HAUSMANN, ROSALIE L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HAUSMANN, ROSALIE L.

block.p: HAUSMANN--Rosalie L. On Sunday April 29, 2007, of Chevy Chase, MD. Wife of the late David S. Hausmann, mother of Beth Mauser, grandmother of Amy Mauser and Elizabeth (Eric) Goldstein, great-grandmother of Brittany, Dana and David. Graveside services on Tuesday, May 1, 2007, 2 pm at Mount Ararat Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. Memorial contributions to The Barker Foundation, 7979 Old Georgetown Rd., Bethesda, MD 20814 or to Children's National Medical Center, 111 Michigan Ave. NW, Washington D.C., 20010. Services by Torchinsky Hebrew Funeral Home, Washington D.C., 1-800-5005401.
